name: koito
tagline: A self-hosted watchlist and progress tracker for anime and TV shows
description: Koito is a self hosted media and watch list tracker for anime and shows. It integrates with external databases, keeps track of episodes watched and organizes series, offering a simple interface for managing your watch progress.

features.title: Media Request Management
features.description: Request movies and series through a web interface

features.title: Media Server Integration
features.description: Send requests to supported media servers

features.title: User Requests
features.description: Allow users to submit and track media requests

features.title: Approval Workflow
features.description: Review and approve or reject requests

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the request system on your own infrastructure
